column1: At last, I finally found it!
So this is the source of magic, huh.
Now I can collect the magic energy happilyyy!
This is unexpected.
There are still people who are able find this place?
If you follow the direction of concentrated magic, it is actually pretty easy to find!
Oh, really? So you must be a person who thirsts for magic power, huh?
Since Kage failed to stop you, you must be really strong.
Thanks for the complimeeent.
With that said, what is the purpose of summoning so many shooting stars?
To realize my dream.
Your dream!?
Yes, other than enhancing our magic power,
they are also able to make all our wishes come true.
This is so messed up.
Have you ever heard of the “Star God”?
What's with this new god…?
The power of faith will eventually be conveyed to the Star God
through this prayer ritual,
so in the end, that power of faith will be converted into a power of dreams and desires!
Is that true!?
Certainly.
That's amazing!
But, if that happens, Gensokyo will be utter chaos!
So you want to stop me?
Even though I'd like to make a wish to enhance my magic,
a procedure like enhancing magic power has to abide by the laws of Gensokyo!
If you always abide by the law, nothing will happen at all!
It seems like this conversation is going nowhere.
O dazzling Star God!
Convert these shooting stars into magical power!
Protect my people!
